name: Synonim - Full dark
description: A full dark theme for synonim.net
css: @-moz-document regexp("https?:\/\/(www\.)?synonim\.net.*"){#page,#page section,#mdef,#bot{background:#1C1C1C;}textarea,textarea{border:1px solid #666;min-height:80px !important;height:auto;resize:vertical;}input[type=text],input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=tel],textarea{color:#aaaaaa;background:#343434;}#fx input[type=text]{color:#bebebe;background:#414141;border-color:#999999;}a,a[href]{color:#3275d4;}a:hover,a[href]:hover{color:#72a0e1;}#fx{background-color:#272727;}#top{background:#343434;}#fx a{border:none;}#fx a:hover{border:none;}table tr td{width:100%;}h1{color:#f6f6f6;}h2{color:#e9e9e9;}h3{color:#dddddd;}h4{color:#d0d0d0;}h5{color:#c3c3c3;}h6{color:#b6b6b6;}#mall p,#mgru p,#minf p,p{color:#909090;}html{background:#1C1C1C;}body{background:#131313;color:#909090;}}
